title: commencement of classes
content: i have finished submitting all the docs for admission. will i receive any message or mail regarding the commencement of classes, orientation day, etc?

comments.body: Yes, you will receive a text message and/or an email. They will send it soon. It is usually after all of the rounds of PESSAT counselling are over. The second round of PESSAT counselling usually after KCET's round. I don't know about which round is over as of today. You can have an idea of the timeline from what I just told.
Only pessat 1st round has finished up until now
